title: From the bottom to the top
creator_credit: Jim Berkey, Claire Stapleton, Paul Quinlan and Department of Education Queensland
brief_description: The first part of this tape encourages confidence in the water through familiarization, body awareness and movement in the water. The second part presents a natural progression from water activities to swimming skills.
creator_credit_for_label: Jim Berkey, Claire Stapleton, Paul Quinlan and Department of Education Queensland
